topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Checking Block Storage

body.p: The Cinder block storage backend must be configured to use VSA, 3Par, or Ceph.

HPE Helion OpenStack aims to support all Cinder backends which have an upstream OpenStack driver, but only these three have been thoroughly tested. .LVM as a back end is generally considered as suitable for demonstrations, not production-grade environments. For complete information on how to configure each option, click the relevant link to view the HPE Helion OpenStack documentation.
To quickly determine which Cinder flavor is in use, SSH into the HP Helion OpenStack Deployer and run cinder type-list
If you do not have administrator permissions, this command may not return any results. Consult the admin who created the volume types for this information.
If you did not create the volume types and the results are cryptic (my-volume instead of ceph-volume), consult the admin who created them.
